description:
XForge will develop a Telegram-based market notification service for SwarmVentures' premium market insights offering:

Core Deliverables:
1. Telegram Bot Development
- Custom swarm watchlist management
- Price threshold alert system
- Direct trading page links
- Private chat notifications

2. Backend Systems
- Price monitoring engine
- User subscription management
- Notification delivery system
- Data integration with market maker API

3. Infrastructure Integration
- KinOS Essential Package integration
- Market data access implementation
- Subscription payment processing
- System monitoring and alerts
objectives: Develop and deploy a reliable notification system for SwarmVentures' premium market insights service
focus: Technical development of Telegram bot and supporting systems
